tag_list: startups, strategy, marketing, online-marketing, local-marketing, media, online-media, local-media, search-engine-optimization, seo, search-engine-marketing, sem, email-marketing, social-media, business-development, partnerships, affiliate-marketing, web-
overview:
Lee Mills is a start-up marketing pioneer with over 17 years of experience in high tech, software, consumer goods and ecommerce. He is a recognized marketing expert who has had case studies published, speaks at industry conferences, was named a Media Magazine ‘Rising Media Star’ in 2004 and most recently won a Gold Medal for Multivariable testing for lifting MojoPages.com conversion rates over 40%.

Currently Lee is serving as the Vice President of Marketing for MojoPages.com, an online local search engine which received $5M (series A) from Austin Ventures.

Lee also serves as a consultant for select clientele as well as a Board Advisor to several tech start-ups including:

Attachmore (www.attachmore.com) is a software/web application that provides the easiest way to share large files with just the click of your mouse.

Chatmeter (www.chatmeter.com) is a Local Brand Management (LBM) platform, helping large franchises and agencies with hundreds of locations measure and improve their marketing presence & effectiveness.

DealCurrent (www.dealcurrent.com) is one of the nation’s fastest growing daily deal software companies offering a robust suite of hosted social commerce solutions and sales force training tools for media publishers who want to increase revenue.

DonationMatch (www.donationmatch.com) is a place for charitable businesses and nonprofits to connect easily online and get donated goods, certificates, and services featured at charitable fundraising events.

EcoPackStore (www.ecopackstore.com) Provides environmentally friendly biodegradable tape, packing, food, home and office supplies that are good for business and even better for the planet.

Realtidbits (www.realtidbits.com) builds products for the real-time web including real-time comments, photo galleries and forums. Customers include ESPN, The Washington Post and Universal Music Group.

Lee also serves as the President of the iMarketers Association (www.imarketers.org) a group of over 1,600 innovative marketing professionals. iMarketers is for marketers, by marketers, about innovative marketing.
